Title: Light's Gambit
Description:
It's fine! We can catch you up on the rest of the rules later!

Resolving combat is the most fun, anyway!

You and Anduin can team up against me. Perhaps with the both of you together, you'll stand a chance!

<Faerin laughs.>
ObjectivesText: Grab the castle piece to start a game of Light's Gambit with Faerin and Anduin.
RewardText: I hope you found that relaxing, too, $n. I didn't realize how much we all needed a break.
